entry.title: Operation: Sleep Well, Destroy Better
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,191Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Clark Kent's marriage to Bruce Wayne threw him straight into the chaos of the Batfam—a den of chronic insomnia and neglected self-care. Determined to enforce at least a bare minimum of healthy routine, Clark declared war on sleepless nights and diets of pure black coffee.Some accepted the changes reluctantly. But Tim Drake? Tim was a whole other challenge.After countless failed attempts to convince him to take better care of himself, Clark decided to fight dirty. The offer? 90 days of regulated sleep and less coffee in exchange for a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity—to humiliate Lex Luthor.Now, the looming question: Will Tim hold up his end of the deal, or will his work obsession (and caffeine addiction) sabotage his own revenge?

entry.title: Calm down, Smallville!
entry.summary:
Author: Cohrareads

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,911Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 28

Summary: “Why do I get the feeling you’re not quite ready for this to be over?” Clark asked, his tone playful yet hopeful. Bruce met his gaze, a slow smile spreading across his face.“You know me well,” Bruce replied, his voice laced with affection. “How about you come back to the manor with me? We can continue this little adventure.”Clark hesitated only a moment, his heart soaring at the invitation. He couldn’t deny how much he wanted to accept, to see where the night would take them. But he didn’t want to appear too eager. He tried to play it cool, though his expression betrayed his excitement. “What about my busy schedule?” he teased. “Big plans and all that?”Bruce chuckled, leaning forward with a captivating intensity. “Oh, I think I can convince you. I’ll make sure you get back to Metropolis in one piece.”

entry.title: New to Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: LapineDoodle

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,094Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 10

Summary: So what if it's impulsive to move thousands of miles from home to New Jersey of all place? Gotham rent is cheap and have better public infrastructure despite the high crime rate. And beside, not like she can pass on the chance to attend Gotham University with free tuition thanks to grants and scholarship. So, it's time for Reyna to experience the wild Gotham City and potentially get herself into some shenanigans. At least there are bats and birds around to save the day.

entry.title: As Though the Sun Will Never Set
entry.summary:
Author: Scarlet609

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,306Chapters: 2/65Kudos: 48

Summary: Bruce Wayne has done something to get him sent to live with the Kents, he thought it would be mundane and unfulfilling, but he soon finds himself caught between something dangerous and wonderful. There are factions moving in to claim his prize, his newly found trump card and he's not ready to let it go.Enter Clark, the soft-spoken Kansas farm boy, just a little too wholesome, a little too comfortable with cows and crickets and just a little too strong for his own good.As Bruce enters the plotters and begins weaving his web of seduction and treachery, mundanity seems further and further away, slipping through Clark's fingers.

entry.title: Oooo you wanna kiss me so bad
entry.summary:
Author: iMiss2012fandomVibes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,679Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 59

Summary: “You’re not healing,” Bruce stressed.“I am," said Clark, "it’s just the kryptonite in my bloodstream. When I get back up into the sun it’ll heal faster. I’m still feeling weak and probably can’t fly yet, but I already feel tons better… Thank you."Bruce didn’t respond. He looked at him skeptically before putting his hand over Clark’s, pinning it down to the table.“Push up on my hand.”Sexual tension while stitching up wounds trope. The Kryptonite is a metaphor.

entry.title: Slow, fast, then faster
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,839Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 65

Summary: It was bad, but not bothersome enough.For a while.For a while, Clark handled the buds of his feelings very well, meticulously pruning them to the right degree every time they seemed like they were going to bloom into a wild and uncontrolled garden. He was Superman—more often than not, he had to work hard to be in perfect shape.When Bruce was a little too close, a little too attractive, a little too warm, Clark quickly tried to push away any feelings of lust, trying to solemnly focus on the more tender feelings while trying to diminish them.He could do it. No problem.Or at least he thought he could.

entry.title: With All Due Respect
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrapefruitSoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,295Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 69

Summary: Bruce gave a slight smile, his voice low and curiosity piqued. “You have permission to speak.” Clark shifted uncomfortably, his gaze dropping to the ground. “As someone who’s dedicated his life to your safety and happiness,” he began, his voice quiet but steady, “it matters deeply to me that you choose a partner truly worthy of you — someone who honors your love and your loyalty.” He drew in a slow breath, then lifted his eyes to meet Bruce’s. “And I’m afraid, my prince… the man you’re considering is not that person.”Or Clark is in love with Bruce, the prince he protects and Bruce is oblivious.

entry.title: Hiding In Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: aster_ion

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,458Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 199

Summary: Batman is wary of Superman. He doesn't trust the all powerful alien – he's seen firsthand how absolute power can corrupt an individual. It’s only a matter of time before he snaps.Clark Kent is wary of Bruce Wayne. He's met too many men like him – charming, arrogant, and swimming in more money than they know what to do with. He’s hiding something, Clark is sure of it.Bruce would do anything to learn more about the threat Superman poses, so when an unassuming new reporter with mysterious connections to the superhero takes over the Gotham beat, he doesn’t pass up the opportunity.Seducing Clark Kent wasn’t exactly the plan, but hey, Bruce isn’t complaining.
